akn:section.akn:heading: National Tree Seed Laboratory; disposition of fees

akn:content.akn:p: § 580q. National Tree Seed Laboratory; disposition of fees Notwithstanding any other provision of law, fees received by the National Tree Seed Laboratory, administered by the Forest Service, United States Department of Agriculture, for the provision of a tree seed testing service, shall be retained and deposited as a reimbursement to current appropriations used to cover the costs of providing such service. (Pub. L. 99–198, title XVII, § 1772, Dec. 23, 1985, 99 Stat. 1658.)
